description: Burnout Questionnaire ðŸ”¥ based on Maslach Burnout Inventory (MBI) to measure professional and job burnout.
information: This Maslach Burnout Inventory (MBI) questionnaire consists of 22 statements about the professional's feelings and attitudes in their work and their relationship with their co-workers. Its function is to measure professional burnout. This test aims to measure the frequency and intensity with which Burnout is suffered.
disclaimer: This questionnaire does not replace nor is it intended to replace a diagnosis by mental health professionals.
